website_summaries.verdict: Ultra-popular lunch box dedicated to serving on-the-go children and busy parents.
pros: Divided into 5 compartments for healthy portion control
Removable interior is safe for dishwasher and microwave
cons: Tray insert can get stuck in lid
More expensive than some would like

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Has a great seal and perfect portion for my 3 year old. The latches are easy to open. People complain about the seal on the upper portion getting moldy or filthy. I just line that with the press and seal plastic wrap. Easy on and easy off. It probably gives it a better seal because I have no liquid crossover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is too bad, because we like the box otherwise
customer_reviews.text: We have owned this product for only two months, and the plastic clips that hold the top on have already broken. The box goes inside an insulated and padded bag every day, so it is well protected. The plastic around the clips appears weak and inherently flawed in design. We own two, used by two different children, and both boxes (bought at two different times and in two different colors) have the same problem. It is too bad, because we like the box otherwise. But, save your money and buy something more durable.
customer_reviews.author: TPH

customer_reviews.title: I am truly disappointed. The salad dressing leaked all over my
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this box after searching for a box with a sauce(dressing) holder however after using the middle circular spot for dressing for my child's veggies ,I am truly disappointed. The salad dressing leaked all over my.child's lunch and fruit and everything else I had packed . I feel the leak proof is inaccurate and I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Not spill/leak proof
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. Not impressed. Dressing spilled into other compartments. Oreos were soggy in both boxes
customer_reviews.author: Cosmosrn

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Broke within 5 months of normal use and hand washing. The inner tray snapped and cracked badly when pressing it into the case. good luck getting a warranty replacement from Bentgo even though the listing states there is a 2 yr warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Megi

customer_reviews.title: Mold and lots of wear
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this lunchbox 5 stars, because it's just the right size to send snacks and lunch to daycare, and does a great job keeping everything separates. However, after 4 months of use, the rubber seal is splitting/shredding and tonight I noticed mold along it. We handwash it every night, pat dry and let it air dry overnight. Needless to say we won't be using it any longer.
customer_reviews.author: KrysElla

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler, but broke after a couple months
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect size and configuration for our toddler's lunch at preschool. The teachers even commented on how great having the small compartments was for developing fine motor skills. Unfortunately, one of the plastic edges that secures the latch broke after a couple months. We kept using it with one latch--we just stopped putting liquidy things like hummus or dressing in the center dipping compartment to prevent leaks--but last week the second plastic edge broke as well so now it's useless. It's really too bad because it was perfect and otherwise exactly what we were looking for. I won't be buying another one since I am doubtful of it's ability to hold up long-term.
customer_reviews.author: LBM202

customer_reviews.title: Loved the bento box, but sad it developed mold
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bento box and it has worked really well up until this point. I noticed there was some black mold that developed within the seal on the lid. I let it soak in vinegar for a long while, but alas, it will not budge with soap or other cleaning products. I wash the bento box by hand every work day when it comes home from daycare, but it still developed the mold. I liked the box because the portions are a good size, its sturdy, and the seal helps keep the contents within their section. Sad to see the mold...
customer_reviews.author: John Dyson

customer_reviews.title: Hard to close, leaks a little, gets dinged/stained easily
customer_reviews.text: We got two (green and purple) because the kiddo (almost 4) loved the mix and match idea. Not sure if the frozen blueberries leaked into the gnocchi after lunch (lid seemed securely closed) or before. Kiddo can open but hard to push down tight enough to latch properly. First wash of the green one it immediately discolored from pasta sauce from another plate next to it. It also now has a dent after only the third wash and second use at preschool. We'll probably use these more for when we're going to the park and have to get something else for preschool, and definitely no wet or drippy stuff going in.
customer_reviews.author: Jennyusagi

customer_reviews.title: ... one of these for each of my kids and loved them initially
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these for each of my kids and loved them initially. After about 6 months, the rubber part on the inside of the lids began getting cracking and mildewing. Both were washed according to directions (not in the dishwasher) and my kids' daycare takes the bottom part out for the kids to eat so I know they weren't gouging the rubber with a fork or anything. I invested in these thinking they'd last years. I wouldn't recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Puryear

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money.
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit in standard size lunch bag... well you can fight with it and jam it in but no way my kids are going to wrestle it out and in again... we now use them for car snacks only... so if like me you watched the YouTube videos that says they fit in the lunch boxes just know that they do not. And the portion size is tiny!!! You cannot fit a sandwich even when cut in half and those tiny compartments make fitting snacks in very difficult unless the whole thing is a snack... not even for a toddler is that enough space.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product and even BETTER customer service!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this Kids Bentgo lunch box for preschool and loves it. Mom loves it too because it truly takes the stress out of having to pack up a toddler lunch. I can easily fill it with items from the fridge and pantry and it keeps everything fresh and sealed. I had a minor issue with the latch and called customer service. They quickly and kindly helped me to replace the lunch box and couldn't have been nicer throughout the phone call. Highly recommend the product and the company selling them!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: No mold on ours!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve just been using ours for about a month now, but so far, so good. Pros: - Portioned inside allows my kids so many options for food choices for the day. - No tiny, individual containers = no missing lids that were accidentally thrown in the trash. - Inside compartment is dishwasher safe. - Low enough profile that I can put a thin ice pack underneath the Bentgo box and it still fits inside the lunchbox. - No leaking so far. Cons: - Outer box has to be hand washed due to rubber seals. I would recommend this to anyone with kids who pack a lunch. If you found this review helpful, please click, “helpful” below.
customer_reviews.author: oneboyonegirl

customer_reviews.title: Good product and company has great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these lunchboxes for my 3 year old twins, they’re great because i can pack them options of snacks and don’t have to use ziploc bags as they’re leak proof. Only complaint is, the hinges broke after only 4 months of use. I contacted Bentgo and they offered replacement boxes to replace the damaged ones. I’m extremely happy with their prompt customer service and willingness to make it right. My boys really like these and we do to, so we are happy to receive replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: TWO YEAR WARRANTY!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Works great and the seals work perfectly. Now granted, I wouldn't fill up one of the sections with soup, buti would think that is common sense. We had one issue, the plastic piece that the latch clips to broke off after six months of use. What did I do there? I went to the website sent an email to let them know, they requested a picture to the broken one and try sent me a replacement that I received within a week. Exceptionally great customer service from Bentgo.
customer_reviews.author: B.K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lunchbox option.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE our bentgo box. My two-year-old is in Mother’s Day Out twice a week and we use it as her “lunchbox.” We also use it on other outings as well. My favorite part about it is the fact that it is spillproof and that it has individualized compartments - and that the tray can go in the dishwasher. An unexpected benefit of all the compartments is that when my toddler eats lunch out of it on the go (like in the car), it is much less messy than if I just handed her a little cup or plate
customer_reviews.author: Loren M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I put in the dish washer few times and the lid broke. The instructions on the box does mention to only use the tray in dishwasher not the lid. Lid is supposed to be hand washed to retain silicone sealing. My 3 1/2 yo used it for 6 months. Good size compartments for toddler meal. Good quality too. I reached out to customer support about replacement lid, and within a few hours I got a response. The customer support confirmed my shipping address and immediately sent me a confirmation email saying they will ship me a replacement. Now, that's called Excellent Customer Service.
customer_reviews.author: Rov

customer_reviews.title: We Went Bento!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has some picky tastes- has stopped liking any school lunches, doesn't like traditional lunch foods like sandwiches, etc, so this has helped to solve some of the issues. A little bit of various left overs, finger foods, and snacks are a perfect fit for this lunch box. It fits well in her Lands End brand lunch box- and sits well on top of a reusable ice pack. It seals easily, and I have even been able to put in dipping sauces in some compartments without a single leak. This is also easy to clean- the food compartment is removable which makes it easy to clean either by hand or in the dishwasher. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: Love this box
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these for my boys. I absolutely love them. The tray is removeable which allows for easy cleaning. They have 20 minutes for lunch and this box saves the time and trouble of trying to open up packages. It seemed the box may be a little difficult for the little ones to open but they haven't had any problems. The portion cups seem a little small to me but my boys haven't complained. In fact, they tell me their lunch was awesome! It is leak proof but the hot foods do not stay hot. Still, I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better Than I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this out of necessity as my child's school required these due to COVID regulations. I had sticker shock initially but now understand why it's so pricey. This lunchbox is so much better than I expected. I'm not wasting a bunch of plastic bags or washing lots of small food containers anymore. I love that I can put applesauce in it and not worry about any leaking. The portion sizes are perfect for my almost 3 year old and I even fill it up with afternoon snacks when we are out and about. It's smaller than a regular lunchbox and will fit in a small backpack. Love love love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for when you're stuck on lunch ideas
customer_reviews.text: The company has EXCELLENT customer service and a nice 2 year warranty. I have been using these lunch boxes for a few years now and they are a great solution to quickly figuring out what to pack my daughter for lunch each day. The leak proof works enough that nothing leaks OUT of the box, but I have experienced some leaking between sections within the box. More so with age of the Bentgo. Overall they are a great product and we continue to use them from preschool into Kinder and 1st grade. I recommend them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Aibanana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for younger kids, mom on the go or home cooked meal for school.
customer_reviews.text: I love this company. Bought the purple one but I did end up returning it because my 7-years-old daughter is a big eater. I ended up returning it and buying two other ones that is not kids version. This is a good quality product, I would definitely recommend buying one if you're a parent on the go with your child or want to send your child to school with a healthy meal. This is perfect for younger kids. Also, I love that it has the latch.
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Gilles

customer_reviews.title: Breaks very easily
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the design is so cool, especially for school aged children. But the plastic part that holds the clasps on outer shell broke about a month into school. I contacted the company directly and they were willing to replace it for me once. It broke again within a month. SO I just ordered the tray tops that can go on the inner tray instead of another outer shell. Both of the trays cracked (because there was no outer shell) a couple months into using it without the shell. Even though the concept behind this item is awesome, the design is very poor. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bretagne

customer_reviews.title: best lunch box and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this lunch box in April 2018. My son used it for preschool last year and this year. He absolutely loves it. It doesn't leak with yogurt or applesauce. He is able to open it himself and he enjoys all the compartments. The lid stopped snapping shut. I went to buy another one but saw there is a 2 year warranty. I reached out to the company and they sent me a replacement in less than a week. It was super easy and simple. Amazing customer service. I had already purchased the purple one for my daughter. Now they have a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Ima15

customer_reviews.title: All your foods will become one!
customer_reviews.text: It sucks!!!!! All the foods mix together!!!!!!! It will not keep anything separate!!!! Have not found a lunch container that will keep the meat and the ketchup and the apple sauce separate! This was not inexpensive and by her lunch time I got a picture of all her foods mixed together ugh, such a waste!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Great size for kids!
customer_reviews.text: This lunchbox is great for my son. He has trboubles opening and closing other containers, but this is one he has gotten the hang of and he really likes it. It keeps everything sealed inside so nothing spills out. The tray is easily removable for easy cleaning! The tray also holds up well on the top rack of the dishwasher. As I've read in other reviews, I haven't had any issues with mold growing along the inside seals. I rinse it out right after school and it gets washed that same night, then it air dries all night. In the morning, it's ready to use again the next day or be closed/put away.
customer_reviews.author: Bri J

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Bentgo box I have purchased. I tried once to purchase a less expensive brand, and my preschooler hated it because he couldn’t open it himself and had to get a teacher to help. These boxes I feel inspire creativity as well, with all the different compartments. Becomes a challenge to see how much variety you can fit it. I subtracted one star only because the box itself isn’t dishwasher safe and also on one of our boxes the rubbery material is starting to shred a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Adam and Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when my son started Kindergarten. He is a picky eater and also doesn't eat a lot of food. I love the small little spots that I can put different things in there. It gives him a bigger variety but with small portions so if he doesn't eat it all then there's not so much waste. I put things like turkey lunch meat, cheese, pretzels, fruit or waffles, sausage, fruit and yogurt. My only complaint is this is not leak proof. If I add syrup for waffles or ketchup for chicken nuggets it does leak into other containers. I have to either leave it out or add a small container to his lunch bag for this.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Slusher

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t close after only 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bentgo kids lunch box I bought. I was very happy with the first one and used it for about three years before the back latches starting falling off. So I got this one to replace it. It worked fine for about two months and then suddenly the pieces didn’t fit together so now it doesn’t close all the way. The latch in the back also fell off, and now I’m keeping it closed with rubber bands and my 5 year old is complaining that it doesn’t keep his lunch warm. I’m totally disappointed and will not be buying this again. Save your $ and get a metal lunch box with sleeve instead.
customer_reviews.author: hangali

customer_reviews.title: Received used lunchbox from Amazon, but Bentgo company customer took care of me
customer_reviews.text: Seriously???!!! Open the box & got a used box with some kids name on it.. Ryder Anderson.. Awesome! UPDATE: I was truly upset when I received the used lunchbox, Amazon even had me ship back before they would issue my refund. However, I reached out directly to Bentgo customer service & the customer service is great, they responded to my email quickly & are sending me a replacement. I would not hesitate ordering the Bentgo lunchboxes directly from company!
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Bracken

customer_reviews.title: Too small for older toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I expected more from this box. It looked so cool on Instagram but when I actually received it it was not as practical as I anticipated. The portion sizes are too small for my 3 year old. Its a good portion for a kid just barely starting solids but for toddlers it's just inconvenient. And leak proof isn't really necessary because I'm not packing anything especially watery it's just for a variety of snacks. The circle compartment in the center for sauce is just a waste of space. A basic meal prep container would suffice for packing snacks and I regret purchasing this
customer_reviews.author: daniella

customer_reviews.title: Stands the test of time!
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these for my daughter and she’s in her third year using it almost daily. It’s holding up great. We ordered another one for my son who is now taking it to day care as a 3yo. The portion size of the compartments has been perfect for her. Maybe a little big for my younger one but we don’t fill the compartments. The only negative is we’ve found things too “liquid-y” leak out (e.g., applesauce, yogurt). Probably peanut butter would be okay like the picture. We’ve been very happy over all. Colors don’t fade. Fits in lunch bags with a drink, utensils, napkin.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love the Bentgo box and the PB kids cold lunch pack together!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed so far with our Bentgo box. I bought this for my first grader who is about to start school. I do wish they had bigger box options but I think with me adding an extra snack it will be fine. While looking I couldn’t find info on what lunch boxes would fit this box. We ended up buying the Pottery barn kids cold lunch pack and it fits great and has room to add a pack of chips and other snacks. Very impressed with these 2 products together.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the lunchbox, and 2 year warranty!!!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this lunchbox for my son over a year ago and we have loved it! Never had any issues with leaking into other compartments! It may look a little small, but the compartments are deep and you can really fit quite a bit of food in them! My only complaint is that the latches both broke at the same time, however im not sure if it was due to our sitter closing them incorrectly or not . BUT I will say there is a 2 YEAR WARRANTY that i was able to use and they are shipping me a brand new box! I will be buying another lunchbox for my daughter when she starts solids!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin N.

customer_reviews.title: Leak Proof Quality Lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this lunch box that I purchased for my son. I really like that there are multiple portion size options to beak up the lunch box monotony. The lunchbox keeps everything secure and in place and is leak proof which is the most important thing. Another plus is the 2 year warranty which they stand behind. I have hand washed the entire lunchbox and the customer service staff happily assisted me when I had an issue. I highly recommend Bentgo!
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Great bento box for kids and great customer servce
customer_reviews.text: We have bought a number of these for our kids and use them every single day. Perfect for young kids, and virtually leakproof. They are great for mindlessly putting together lunches before the caffeine has fully kicked in -- just fill each of the little sections with a portion, and dunzo! So easy and helps avoid the retribution of a hangry child who says to you after school, but you forgot to include my sandwich/fruit/veggie/etc in my lunch today! Also great warranty -- when the latches on one of ours broke after a year, the company sent us a new one, which was really great. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: GREAT customer service
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing 2 of these and having them break rather quickly the company sent me 2 replacements free of charge. So far they are amazing and holding up well. This box is great for younger kids. Easy to open and no leaking ever! Original Review: I purchased 2 of these boxes and at first they were amazing. But the hinges on both boxes broke within 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: AshtonLynn

customer_reviews.title: Two year warranty
customer_reviews.text: My son really enjoys his lunches in the bentgo box and states he prefers these lunches over cafeteria school lunches or brown bag lunches. It’s easy for him to open and secure. When the latches broke I was so upset because I loved the design of the bentgo box so much. I contacted the manufacturer and literally within minutes I had a response to send pictures and proof of purchase. (There is a two year warranty) I’m so glad I contacted them as now they are sending me a replacement within the week. I highly recommend this company and the bentgo box!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: It's moldy after just a few uses.....
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars *if* the rubber seals in the lid didn't grow black mold after only using it twice. I always washed it immediately after each use and dried it before putting it away but the mold is still there and has basically soaked into the rubber. Gross.. My son loves this bento box so I'm sad to have to look for something new. Maybe an all metal one would be better. Truthfully I don't love plastic but wanted something that wouldn't leak. it doesn't leak but it does grow mold. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: SBH

customer_reviews.title: Meh...I don’t get the hype.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these because they seem to be all the rage these days and my daughter is a grazer so I always have to pack a variety of snacks for her. It’s just...ok. I don’t really get the hype I guess. The one thing I don’t like is how hard it is to close. It’s definitely not something my 4 yr old can do by herself and sometimes even when I think I’ve closed it myself, it’s actually open. I do like that the tray can be washed without having to wash the case. But liquids do leak into the case sometimes - probably apart of that closing issue. And it’s really heavy!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Behrens

customer_reviews.title: Only container needed for school!
customer_reviews.text: This product has made packing lunch for my toddler a breeze! With the different sizing portions I can ensure he's getting the portions I'd like for certain food groups. He also gets excited to open the box and see what's inside! Cleaning one container versus several has also been very helpful. We also use this when on the go as well and not just school. Would highly recommend the product and the customer service team was beyond wonderful when I had questions!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Time

customer_reviews.title: Works great and outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product works great for my kids lunches. I was so happy with the first one I bought for my daughter that I bought one for my son when he started school. The compartments are great for putting a variety of foods. I have never had a problem with them leaking. After a year of use the inside tray suddenly had a crack. I contacted bentgo customer service through their website. I received a response the very next morning and after I emailed back with the specifics they mailed out a replacement. The whole process was very easy.
customer_reviews.author: MrsAThomas

customer_reviews.title: GREAT lunchbox and EXCELLENT customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these boxes in March of 2018. I just had a problem with one of the boxes cracking and the latch breaking. Just one of them. I emailed Bentgo Kids customer service and sent them a couple of pictures of the one box and they are sending a replacement, as these have a 2 year warranty. No hassles, no questions, no nothing. Just simple, great service. As for the boxes, they are AWESOME! My daughter has packed a lunch every day last school year and this one and loves all the fun stuff we can put in there. I highly recommend these and will be buying more when my son is of school age.
customer_reviews.author: Leesa

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Just like many of the reviews I read, it broke within a month. I still used it after it broke because it was only one clasp and the other still kept it closed. It continued to fall apart breaking between the compartments as well. I finally just threw it in the trash. It is a lot of $ for it to just fall apart so quickly and easily. I had hoped the other reviewers just had bad luck or were rough on the product. I can assure you we were not rough in it. It is also very heavy like others said as well.
customer_reviews.author: Smilesjamie

customer_reviews.title: It's just too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for my kids to take to school for lunches. I thought it would be super cool and that they'd get to have a variety of things. The problem with this is I just can't fit enough food into these to be useful. My kids are kindergarten and 1st grade so unfortunately this isn't a big kid problem. They stained as well when I used ketchup. My opinion is that for the price, these are not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: M. Spliedt

customer_reviews.title: Three months and have already saved money
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Probably my favorite purchase of the year. My preschooler uses it M-F and I have already saved money from using. We no longer by individual portion size but rather larger cartons of cottage cheese, yogurt, dipping sauce,etc. in addition I have not had to buy baggies. In addition to saving money, I have reduced my carbon footprint. Every night I hand wash and let air dry. We have never experienced leaking or food getting soggy. In general We love it because it allows flexibility in food prep.
customer_reviews.author: Feather

customer_reviews.title: Great company, fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: We had had this box for a few months when one of the hinges broke off. Shouldn't happen, but fortunately the company did an outstanding job replacing the broken box (under warranty) with a new one in less than a week. One email to customer service, and the replacement was on its way. Other than the hinge, this is a great bento box. Feels very sturdy and locks tight. Would and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jansen Jansen

customer_reviews.title: functional but heavy
customer_reviews.text: I love how functional this is for school lunches. It has saved a lot of money and waste (no plastic bags needed!). The one downside, is the material is relatively heavy compared to just a typical lunch box. This is a bit tough as I watch my five year old with a really heavy backpack catch the bus- but I think its worth it. I'm also hoping it will last well over time, and will update this review in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: SMR

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I knew my son would love these but I was worried about keeping them clean. I envisioned peanut butter finding its way into crevices and water hanging out in crevices and generally having the same fights I have with our systema boxes. NOT SO. I wish they made adult ones because even with the pop out internal section it’s ridiculously easy to clean. Edges are rounded so you’re not digging into crevices. It’s a brilliant design and well worth splashing out the cash (because these things are not cheap). Very happy customer. They’ve completely replaced even the brand new systema boxes I had just purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son who will be starting preschool in the fall. We decided to practice using it this summer for park and pool trips. I am impressed with it! Definitely leak proof, we have put liquids (fruit salad, yogurt etc) in the little portions and it hasn’t leaked into other compartments. My 4 year old can open the box himself (something he needs to be able to do in pre k). Easy to wash and assemble. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: JennyB

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Our toddler has food allergies so we prep and pack all meals, 7 days a week. We were using anywhere from 4-5 little bowls which meant that we also had to clean and keep up with 4-5 lids as well as a silverware and the actual try she used to eat from. It became a hassle! So we looked into compartmentalized lunch boxes that were durable and met our needs. It didn't take long to settle on a Bentgo Kids box. This thing is extremely durable and holds everything our toddler will need for each meal. It's easy to clean and fits into the Thermos brand lunch bag we have for easy carrying and transport. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: TFam2014

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for preschooler!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Bentgo lunchbox for our 4 year old. The divided box makes it easier packing a lunch and making sure I’m including all food groups, and in the perfect portion sizes for a preschooler. It’s an attractive way to display her food and easy for little lands to open and close. I haven’t had any issues with leaks the past year + of use. I’m now ordering a second box for my 2 year old for when our family is on the go. This is the most popular bento box at our preschool and it makes sense because it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a kindergartener/great service
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my kindergartener all school year — every day—and it worked well for us. The compartment sizes were good for her and never had issues w leaks. We didn’t have mold issues and did put it in the dishwasher but would probably not put the outer shell in the dish washer again . The latches fell apart toward the end of the school year and I was told we have to close completely and then secure it but I don’t know if it’s realistic for my daughter to remember that . they immediately and easily replaced it and we will give it another go. Very happy w the customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughter to take her snack to school. She loves carrots with ranch and this keeps everything separate and it does not leak. She puts it in her backpack so it is sideways, up side down, and there have been no issues. When I put applesauce or yogurt in it I will also put a plastic spoon in the larger compartment (it fits well). She gets a variety of small snacks during the day and I do not have to worry about a mess. You do need to hand wash it so it maintains the leak-proof seals, but the is not a huge issue. I would recommend this to anyone with younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: thomas ulibarri

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a bento box that was less than half the price ....it was NOT worth it. They broke 2 weeks after the return time frame and I had to throw them away. Luckily, I found these on Prime Day. I wish I would have just spent the money, to begin with. They are so easy to open, even for my 2 year old. The snap that keeps it closed is very sturdy. My fried has one that her daughter has used for 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I wasted my money on this product 👎
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kindergartner at the beginning of the school year. Not even halfway through the school year and it already broke on us. Apart from braking at the hinges, I would also give a low rating due to the fact that my son struggled closing the box leading to big messes in his lunchbox from leftover food. I did however like the colors offered are very bright and colorful, perfect for little ones. I also liked the compartments in the bento box. I would not reccomend this bento box to my friends or family. I feel that for the price, quality should have been a lot better. I wouldn’t waste my money on this box again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Martinez

customer_reviews.title: high quality plastic for durability and is easy for my 7 yr old to open and close
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with the Bentgo Kids Children's Lunch Box. After doing some research I decided to get a Bentgo for my older son and a Yumbox for his younger brother. Both have glowing reviews and I hope they live up to the hype. So far the Bentgo seems to be made of thick, high quality plastic for durability and is easy for my 7 yr old to open and close. I like the larger compartment of the Bentgo compared to the Yumbox and looks like it will hold more than enough food for my 2nd grader.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is top notch!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my rising KG daughter and later for my rising pre K daughter. The sizes of the compartments are perfect and hold just the right amount of food. We use the smallest compartment for sour cream for chips or dessert. Easy to clean and easy to pack. Serves it purpose nicely! We bought the ice packs as well and fit nicely in the lunch box along with the box. In addition to taking these to school everyday we take them on road trips and are perfect for the car. Customer service is top notch, one of ours broke and was promptly and easily replaced! Completely pain free!
customer_reviews.author: MGP

customer_reviews.title: Broken in less than 5 month
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size lunch box for our toddler. If fit perfectly in his school bag and held plenty of food for a good lunch. Even contributed to us getting more creative with what we sent and providing more well-rounded nutrition. That said it did not last very long and is not good quality. We purchased this lunch box for our son in March and by August both of the latches had broken so that it no longer closes. Now we are in the market for a new one and will not be spending the money on something that could not even last a single school year.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Alan Leafman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this lunchbox and the portion sizes and even smaller sections where a toddler can pinch and grasp their food. My daughter loves her lunchbox and I would even like to order another one. It came with good recipe ideas for lunches. I used this a lot when doing early morning drop offs at daycare and when we go on road trips in the car. Very easy to clean and never had a problem with getting stuck on foods off. I highly recommend this lunchbox and I adorned it with cute stickers on the outside. Holds up very well in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Guye

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fun lunches with variety.
customer_reviews.text: A little on the heavy side, but worth it for the durability. My 5 year old has been using this for 5 months - and he loves it. So do I. You can get creative - so he tends to get less bored with his lunches. It washes perfectly no matter what I have put into it - no mold issues, no cracking, no sealing issues, no leaking. Yes, it is small - but it works perfectly for us.
customer_reviews.author: Monica B

customer_reviews.title: Just bought a second one...
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a second bentgo lunchbox for my younger son. My older son has been using his for about one year for preschool (age 4) and we absolutely love it. He loves the color and it fits easily into his pottery barn kids lunch bag. My son is a very picky eater and I really believe this lunchbox is helping him expand his eating choices. He typically won't eat much fruit or vegetables but we are seeing progress at school when he uses his bentgo lunchbox (in combination with little animal food picks). There are enough compartments to provide a good variety of foods. The compartments are a good size for a younger child's appetite. Easy to clean too!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Retirado

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these daily for about six months and we're very happy with them. It's nice to send our toddler to school with only one container to keep track of, and I love that it keeps food items sealed so a sandwich won't get soggy from fruit for example. It definitely holds more than enough food at this age! We have two (one for each kid) and for some reason the hinges on one started to crack. Contacted Bentgo directly and they are shipping us a replacement. Love a company that backs up their product! Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Finally jumped on the BENTGO train!
customer_reviews.text: We decided to try the Bentgo to send my 3 year old son son off to Grammy’s house with a healthy lunch. We are so pleased with it! It is so nice that you don’t have to use multiple containers. It is one box that you can put different foods and each compartment is sealed when the box is closed so they do not mix! My son takes pride in finishing each section and it helps him finish his meal. The compartments are the perfect size and we always are trying to find creative ways to fill them. Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Even Last a Year
customer_reviews.text: Loved this box.... Until I didn’t. Fit the perfect amount of food, kept everything in the right place, and was easy for my kindergartener to use. However, we didn’t even make it through the school year before the plastic clips broke rendering it completely useless. I put it in an insulated Potterybarn lunchbox everyday so it’s definitely not getting overly used. I really wanted to love this but for the cost it should definitely last a school year (or two or three)! I reached out to the company for a replacement and never even received a response. Pretty disappointed in their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: GREAT customer servcie!
customer_reviews.text: I have purcahsed 3 in the past year because it is the easiest way to pack my daughter's lunch. Grain, vegatable, protein, fruit and a treat. I was disappointed that with less than a year of light use my daughter's box broke. I contacted the customer service and they were GREAT! For me how you treat your customers is everything and while I loved the boxes, they have a loyal customer now with that experience alone. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this bento box for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: These are great and have improved my quality of life as a mom who was spending too much time fiddling for many small Tupperware to make two lunches for my kids. The portions are perfect for toddlers, and has plenty for lunch and snacks. They are a bit too heavy for the girls to carry to and from school in a bag, but their qualities include sticky bottom for grip on the table, leak proof for soft food like yogurt or humus, and easy to clean well so far. I'm really pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Casciotti

customer_reviews.title: in hindsight would have gone with metal now that I know how bad plastic is
customer_reviews.text: Thank God it's BPA and phthalates free! Still, in hindsight would have gone with metal now that I know how bad plastic is. I never put them in the dishwasher but the front top is still stratched and worn off and slightly blue colored from rubbing on the other 2 I bought, just storing in the cupboard and picnic bag. But the kids love them, can easily open them, holds the perfect amount of food for a 4, 5 and 7 yr old, definitely spill proof so the little circle can have ranch dressing or ketchup. Offers a variety of little healthy treats that make lunch special, easy to clean and store. Wish they had a handle.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie L. Falcone

customer_reviews.title: Leakproof, Kid durable, Fantastic Lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of the Bentgo Kids lunchboxes over a year ago for our 3yr old and 6 yr old. They quickly surpassed our expectations. We've never had them leak or pop open accidentally. The compartments are perfect size for a variety of foods. This would work well for adult meals too. Extra bonus that their Facebook page gives great ideas and suggestions for lunches and the customer service is phenomenal. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angie C.

customer_reviews.title: Fun while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: We had two of these for our kid's lunch at school and they were great: sealed well, easy to clean, and he could undo the latches himself. However after a couple months of fairly light use, one rear latch broke, then the other. I held them together with tape for a while, but then decided to ask for a refund/exchange. The company kindly replaced the boxes, but these quickly broke again. (We moved on to another brand, which has held up well, but I won't necessarily recommend it because the latches on that box are really hard for little hands to open, and he needs help from his teacher.)
customer_reviews.author: Beroe

customer_reviews.title: Makes making lunch fun
customer_reviews.text: My five year old loves this lunch box, it’s perfect for her to eat out of and just big enough for her snacks when she’s at school. Really easy to clean too. For some reason the one I had purchased later on wouldn’t seal properly recently (I’ve had it for little over a year) it was still under the 2 year warranty so I contacted customer service and they were very quick in replying and are going to send a replacement. We love Bentgo.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Makes Lunch Fun
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The kid loves it. It makes packing a lunch super easy and it comes back pretty much empty. I got this one for a 5 year old boy. I purchase a Yumbox for the 8 year old. This is a better configuration for a younger child. The main compartment fits a sandwich if you cut it right. Sometimes I'll put 3 muffin cups in the larger compartment to create a homemade Lunchable. Tip: cut a piece of Glad Press'n Seal Food Plastic Wrap to fit in the top of the box (don't get crazy about cutting it exact. Just make it fit.). Putting that plastic wrap in the top makes it so much easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: The Pod

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of the Bentgo lunch boxes for my pre-K and Kindergartener. First day is this Monday so I’m excited to see how they do. First impressions so far is that they are very well made! I love how the center is interchangeable and easy access to clean. My pre-K has a little trouble opening but he is on the smaller side. My kindergartener opens with ease. I did get the cat and jack lunch bags from target and they fit pretty well. It was a little hard trying to find one that fit. I will update soon to see how they do this coming week :)
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small kids!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect lunchbox. My son often eats fruits and veggies for lunch. This has a spot for dipping sauce, it never spills out. Each compartment is completely sealed. When I wash it in the evening its very quick. It doesn't hold funny smells and is also dishwasher safe. The two compartments come apart easily. It holds the perfect portion of each side. Its very slim and light weight so it will fit in almost any lunch bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jessalyn Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Great lunchbox with a good warranty
customer_reviews.text: We love these lunchboxes. We have three. We did however leave one outside on what we didn’t know was a hot surface and the case warped. So just be careful not to get the outer shell hot. I realized they have hassle free replacements and so I took advantage of the some what hassle free service. It took 3 messages and one phone call. They then requested mailing it back in (major hassle at this point) but then the rep decided to waive the return of the warped shell and just mail me a replacement. So overall customer service pulled through
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B.

customer_reviews.title: Gets moldy over time
customer_reviews.text: I really like how this box functions. It's super light, easy to pack and close, and it has enough space for my kid's lunch. The major drawback is that only some of the pieces are dishwasher safe. The outer shell is a pain to clean. Also, the rubber parts start to grow mold after about 2 months of use, even with regular cleaning. Given the price of these, they're not very cheap to replace when the rubber wears away or gets moldy.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Keeps lunch cold and not mushy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my granddaughter who’s vegan because it’s hard for her to eat a school lunch. With her other lunch boxes she kept coming back from school with most of her lunch still in the lunch pail. It was always mushy even with a ice pack. She’s a super picky eater and prefers vegetables and noodles. This lunch box works so well she eats all her lunch. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Margie Bracken

customer_reviews.title: Nice size. No Leaks. Great warranty.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for 4-year-old's pre-school snacks and lunch for a year. Great for encouraging the lunch packers to put in lots of different things for a diverse mix to please our picky eater. Our box case broke after 10 months of use. We emailed Bentgo with photos and proof of purchase (from Amazon) and got a replacement. The warranty makes the price worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Binturong

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bento for my 3 and 5 year old boys!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough wonderful things about this product. My boys have been using these from age 3 and it’s still perfect for my 5 year old with a healthy appetite. The thoughtful design makes it so easy to pack a healthy lunch with lots of variety. It’s a tight fit into our Pottery Barn ‘Mackenzie’ size lunch kit but it does fit well with room for a little extra if it’s a long day plus an ice pack. We did have issues with the latches due to my kids rushing and trying to close it in a rush but the Bentgo customer service is second to none! They took care of us and we’ll be Bentgo customers for life.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lunch Box!
customer_reviews.text: These boxes are helpful for packing healthy lunches! The multiple compartments help me organize lunch into main dish, side, dessert, veggie and fruit. I love that there's no wasted sandwich baggies or purchasing multiple tupperware for packing lunches. I also bought a rectangle lunch bag and flat ice pack to use with these and keep it cool until lunch time. This has held up great for us over the 3 years we've had it!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Gabrielse

customer_reviews.title: My kids eat ALL their lunch!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Who would have thought a simple thing like a Bentgo lunch box would be fun and encourage a child to eat all their lunch?! My child (7yo/1st grade and 12yo/7th grade) love to make their lunch the night before and come home with a cleared lunch box! This box encourages: healthy food choices and portion control! I highly recommend and would purchase again... but, we have 1 for each kiddo and that works! (Maybe Mommy and Daddy need one!)
customer_reviews.author: Momma_RN

customer_reviews.title: Nice for smaller kids
customer_reviews.text: Was too small for my 8 year old son. So I purchased the adult sized one, which is great and can hold a larger sized foods, such as chicken tenders and sandwiches. Overall, the quality of this is great. My only suggestion is to improve the feel of the clips that secure it shut. When the lid is closed, it feels tight. However, I don't know how easily the clips will hold up if the lunch box was dropped. The rest of the plastic throughout is nice and thick to allow good insultation.
customer_reviews.author: Summit31

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought two bentgo boxes for the new school year. These have worked out great for our lunches. We bought them to save on disposable plastic use and also to give our kids more of a variety on their foods. I am very satisfied with this product. One of the trays cracked but I was able to call their customer service and they happily agreed to send a replacement tray.
customer_reviews.author: TXgirl

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this. I got this for my daughters lunches ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this. I got this for my daughters lunches and I hope it stays as awesome as it is now for a very long time. I can put yogurt next to her sandwich and toss it in her lunch bag and trust that when it's lunch time, her sandwiches aren't soggy. It's microwavable, the insert that I know of is dishwasher safe ( I use top rack) however, the lid that closes and seals off the compartments is a rubber type of material. I'd hate for that to get ruined so I haven't put that in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 4-yr-old. Very durable.
customer_reviews.text: It’s great and my 4-yr-old loves it. We use it more for snacks, but really it’s got a lot of room for an actual lunch. My son can eat a lot and likes to snack so it works well for us bc he can have a little at school and then for after school care. I saw some complains about being difficult to open, but my son didn’t have any problems. I also have been using the press and seal on the top to avoid mold, but also super helpful for clean up. It is a little heavy (particularly filled with food and in a lunch box with ice packs), but not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jellybean

customer_reviews.title: good quality but too small
customer_reviews.text: The box is very good quality and well made. It doesn't leak. However it is very small. It's not very easy to put a whole sandwich in without squeezing it. The little round hole in the middle is not very practical to use. For big fingers like mine, it can be hard to pick food out . It is also a wast of space. Not recommended for boys with a good appetite.
customer_reviews.author: Reikailu feng

customer_reviews.title: We love our bento kids box!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted lunchables and this was our solution for a "homemade" version! Not only that, but I'm not wasting food or baggies for his school lunches anymore. Super easy to clean and the tray holds up nicely in the dishwasher. The Bentgo CS team is very friendly and easy to work with (quick replies too!). Their 2 year warranty is great and rare these days! We're a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: jwpink33

customer_reviews.title: Great product and amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Bentgo box for my child nearly 2 years ago. It’s great for keeping portions the right size for kids, it’s 100% leakproof and it fits almost any lunch bag/box. Recently however, one of the latches that keeps the box closed and therefore leakproof, broke. I contacted their customer service to let them know ours had broken, so they asked me for a little bit of information, then they sent a completely new replacement of the one I purchased 2 YEARS AGO! Great product but more importantly their customer service is top notch!
customer_reviews.author: JMnPOP

customer_reviews.title: 3 month update NOT GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect lunch box for a toddler.Many compartments.Also a round space for sour cream,ranch or your lil ones favorite dip or spread.Leave plastic protector on when you receive then replace with glad press n seal wrap to prevent molding. Very happy!! 3 month update one latch has broken can not be replaced by Amazon due to warranty out gave me a number for bentgokids CS left 2 messages no one has called me back.This box is very expensive almost $30 now I don't mind paying for quality BUT unfortunately it's hasn't even been 4 months & it's broken.Not a happy camper 😞😞😞
customer_reviews.author: Happy Familiy!!

customer_reviews.title: These are worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I’d pay more if I had too! These are the best. Kids love them, they are easy to use and hold a surprisingly large amount of food when packed right. My kindergartener has yet to finish every piece of food I pack in his for lunch each day. They are also really easy to clean. Plan to get quite a few years out of this. On top of all of that, the customer service behind the scenes is top notch. Super responsive and they truly want to help. That level of service is hard to come by these days.
customer_reviews.author: The Average Mom

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing lunch box I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 of these boxes for my toddlers (4 and 5 years old). My daughters bentgo box lasted 2-1/2 years and my sons lasted a year but thankfully these things have a 2 year warranty! We use these every SINGLE day (even weekends). Before finding this box, I tried many other brands and didn't like any of them. These are TOTALLY leak proof and with the rubber sides -- it makes this thing pretty indestructible. Also, customer service is VERY accommodating and pleasant! I highly recommend this product and will continue to buy these in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Rae

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this! It fits great in a lunch box, perfect portions for my kids, no baggies, can have sauces/yogurt/etc... Love it! Update... my son (special needs) accidentally threw away the inner tray, and this AWESOME company is replacing it at no cost to us. He LOVES this lunchbox, and shows it off to everyone he sees coming down the hall, so he was extremely sad to have 'lost' the inside tray. It'll be like Christmas morning, getting his replacement!! Thank You Bentgo!!!
customer_reviews.author: The Mom!

customer_reviews.title: Overall I love this lunch box
customer_reviews.text: So let’s start by saying this lunch box is great! Perfect for my two year old who goes to parents day out. Although after about 2 months of using it the latches broke. BUT I contacted Bentgo’s customer service line and they where so helpful. They replaced it with a new once completely hassle free!! The customer service was super nice and very quick and easy to resolve. Overall I’m very happy with this lunch box and will be buying a second one soon for my new baby when he starts PBO.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Easy lunches, excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: The Bentgo kids lunch box has made it so much easier to prepare lunch for my pre-schooler! She loves having a variety of foods in each little compartment and they are the perfect size for her age. I also sincerely appreciate the 2 year warranty. The hinges on our box broke from daily use and the process to receive a new box was very simple! Thank you Bentgo for your help!
customer_reviews.author: Amber S.

customer_reviews.title: Fits just the right amount for a preschooler.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old to use at preschool, and it's worked well so far. I hand wash the top at the end of the day and three months in have yet to see any mold, just the expected staining from frquently packing marinara. When he starts eating more I'll want something that fits a whole sandwich, but for now this is perfect. Especially since I have a picky eater who can't be relied on to eat any one thing day to day.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Scudder

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to clean, perfect portions
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this! Fun compartments, environmentally better than all those plastic baggies, dark blue interior portion is removable making it easy to provide child a 'tray' instead of the whole unit, also making it easy to clean (I put the food compartment in the dishwasher and hand wash the rest to keep it from wearing out). Great seals on all compartments, no food moving from one section to the other (even dips, yogurt, etc). Snap closure is firm. Would definitely buy again. NOTE AGE SUGGESTIONS provided by Bentgo. My child is 3 going on 4 and this is a perfect amount of food...would not be large enough for my 10 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Tana Godshall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Service and Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We've been using Bentgo boxes for the last 4+ years and have always had great luck. The newest one we purchased 3 months ago somehow had a clip break on it (we're not sure what could have happened since our kids have seriously abused our previous boxes without anything breaking). I contacted Bentgo support and a replacement box was at our house 2 days later. We couldn't be happier with the product or the company
customer_reviews.author: Richard T. Youmans

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lunch box that is actually leak proof!
customer_reviews.text: Each of my children owns two of these lunch boxes and additional insert with a clear lid, allowing me to prep several lunches at one time. We have been thrilled with this product over the years. It easily holds half of a sandwich plus several other foods. I can even send yogurt or applesauce for lunch without worrying that it will leak into the other compartments. We have only had one problem with the hinges on one box breaking, and Bentgo customer service immediately made it right.
customer_reviews.author: ErinHS

customer_reviews.title: Good but not dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these at first!! I bought 3 of them. Have used them for 3 months. Usually hand wash them every day, and then I stick them in the dish washer once per week, as it says on the produce description that they are dishwasher safe. Well, after only 3 months, they have warped from the dishwasher and will no longer fit together and close. The product is good, but just do not put in the dishwasher. So now mine are ruined!! EDITED! I contacted the company, and they sent me more, free of charge!! Wonderful product and wonderful company to send me a replacement!! Will not put these in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: mommaof4pickeykids

customer_reviews.title: ASD and Toddler Approved
customer_reviews.text: It is a little pricey, but I bit the bullet and got two of these for my kiddos this year. I'm glad I did. So far so good they've held up by handwashing the outside and machine washing the detachable insert tray. My 3 year old and also my fine-motor struggling 6 year old have absolutely no trouble opening and closing the box. We haven't tried any yogurts or anything liquid based but for our needs (mostly sandwiches, chip type items and fruits) it has been wonderful. I plan on purchasing more so I don't have to wash them every night.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

product_meta.title: Bentgo Kids Childrens Lunch Box - Bento-Styled Lunch Solution Offers Durable, Leak-Proof, On-the-Go Meal and Snack Packing (Purple)
feature_bullets: PORTIONED FOR KIDS: 5 practical compartments portioned perfectly for a child’s appetite (recommended for ages 3-7). Plus, drop-proof, rubber-coated edges and a sturdy design for active kids.
LEAK-PROOF TECHNOLOGY: Keeps meals and snacks fresh and mess-free during transport– Includes two kid-friendly latches that are easy for small hands to open and close.

MICROWAVE AND DISHWASHER-SAFE: Removable compartment tray reheats food safely in the microwave and cleans up easily in the dishwasher (hand washing is recommended for the outer shell to preserve the leak-proof seal and extend the longevity of your product).

PURCHASE WITH A PURPOSE: Bentgo continues to be a proud supporter of Feed the Children, a 501(c)(3) nonprofit that gives hope and resources for hungry children and families. Since 2017, Bentgo has donated more than $200,000 to help put an end to hunger.
WHAT YOU GET: Bentgo Kids compartment lunch box, user manual, industry-leading 2 Year Warranty, and caring customer support.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars12,263 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
